ion-hide.description: CSS Utilities Hide Element Class - must be added to class

ion-hide-breakpoints.description: CSS Utilities Hide Element with Display Breakpoints - must be added to class

ion-hide-sm.description: CSS Utilities Hide Element sm - must be added to class. Applies the modifier to the element when min-width: 576px (up) or max-width: 576px (down).

ion-hide-md.description: CSS Utilities Hide Element md - must be added to class. Applies the modifier to the element when min-width: 768px (up) or max-width: 768px (down).

ion-hide-lg.description: CSS Utilities Hide Element lg - must be added to class. Applies the modifier to the element when min-width: 992px (up) or max-width: 992px (down).

ion-hide-xl.description: CSS Utilities Hide Element xl - must be added to class. Applies the modifier to the element when min-width: 1200px (up) or max-width: 1200px (down).

ion-margin.description: CSS Utilities Element Margin - must be added to class

ion-margin-type.description: CSS Utilities Element Margin Type - must be added to class

ion-no-margin.description: CSS Utilities Element No Margin - must be added to class

ion-padding.description: CSS Utilities Element Padding - must be added to class

ion-padding-type.description: CSS Utilities Element Padding Type - must be added to class

ion-no-padding.description: CSS Utilities Element No Padding - must be added to class
